    Class and Description
    AssetLoader
    Abstract base class for asset loaders.

    Interface for classes the can map a file name to a FileHandle.
  • Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.assets.loaders used by com.badlogic.gdx.assets.loaders 
    Class and Description
    AssetLoader
    Abstract base class for asset loaders.
    AsynchronousAssetLoader
    Base class for asynchronous AssetLoader instances.
    BitmapFontLoader.BitmapFontParameter
    Parameter to be passed to AssetManager.load(String, Class, AssetLoaderParameters) if additional configuration is necessary for the BitmapFont.
    FileHandleResolver
    Interface for classes the can map a file name to a FileHandle.
    I18NBundleLoader.I18NBundleParameter 
    ModelLoader.ModelParameters 
    MusicLoader.MusicParameter 
    ParticleEffectLoader.ParticleEffectParameter
    Parameter to be passed to AssetManager.load(String, Class, AssetLoaderParameters) if additional configuration is necessary for the ParticleEffect.
    PixmapLoader.PixmapParameter 
    SkinLoader.SkinParameter 
    SoundLoader.SoundParameter 
    SynchronousAssetLoader 
    TextureAtlasLoader.TextureAtlasParameter 
    TextureLoader.TextureParameter
